project_name.justification: The article is titled 'Nevada Sunrise Receives US$300,000 for the Sale of Non-Core Claims at the Gemini Lithium Project, Nevada'.

company_name.justification: The press release is from 'Nevada Sunrise Metals Corporation (TSXV: NEV) (OTC Pink: NVSGF) ("Nevada Sunrise" or the "Company")'.

ceo_buyer.justification: The buyer is identified as 'Dome Rock Resources, LLC', a private company. No CEO for the buyer is mentioned in the text.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The transaction was for the purchase of 'fifty-seven (57) non-core claims', not a percentage ownership interest in the Gemini project itself.

primary_commodity.justification: The project is consistently referred to as the 'Gemini Lithium Project'.

verified_article_link.justification: The article title 'Nevada Sunrise Receives US$300,000 for the Sale of Non-Core Claims at the Gemini Lithium Project, Nevada' and the content confirm it is about the correct project.

currency.justification: The text specifies the currency in the payment details: 'The purchase price for the acquisition of the Claims by Dome Rock was US$300,000 in cash...'

cash_payments_raw.justification: The purchase price for the acquisition of the Claims by Dome Rock was US$300,000 in cash, which has been received in full by Nevada Sunrise.

share_payments_raw.justification: The transaction was for cash only; no share payments are mentioned.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The payment was explicitly for cash, so this field is not applicable according to the data extraction hierarchy.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: No shares were issued as part of the transaction.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants were mentioned as part of the transaction.

option_payments_raw.justification: No options were mentioned as part of the transaction.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares were issued as part of the transaction, so there is no issue price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The transaction terms do not include an exploration commitment in meters.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The transaction terms do not include a monetary exploration commitment.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: No Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) was mentioned as part of the transaction terms.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text states the total project size: 'Gemini's current size of approximately 5,765 acres (2,330 hectares) of unpatented Bureau of Land Management mineral claims.'

coverage_area_unit.justification: The unit is specified in the same sentence as the area: '...approximately 5,765 acres...'

resource_size.value: 1.3 million tonnes Lithium, or 7.1 million tonnes lithium carbonate equivalent ("LCE") contained within 1,200 million tonnes of lithium-mineralized clay at an average grade of approximately 1,130 parts per million ("ppm") Lithium
resource_size.justification: The text provides a detailed resource estimate: 'The Inferred resource estimate comprises, in an open pit-constrained resource: Approximately 1.3 million tonnes Lithium, or 7.1 million tonnes lithium carbonate equivalent ("LCE") contained within 1,200 million tonnes of lithium-mineralized clay at an average grade of approximately 1,130 parts per million ("ppm") Lithium;'

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer is identified as 'Dome Rock Resources, LLC ("Dome Rock"), a private South Dakota company', which does not have a public ticker or exchange listing.
